title: Consumers who have purchased a meal from a food truck in the U.S. 2014 , by age
summary: Overall Share of respondents has decreased over the Year.
Share of respondents is slightly decreasing from 55_to_64_years to 65_years_and_over.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 55_to_64_years and 65_years_and_over.
The highest Share of respondents, of value 48.0 was reached at Year 55_to_64_years
Minimum Share of respondents about 30.0 was reached at Year 65_years_and_over
